00474 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00475 {
00476     atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00480 {
00481     atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00482 }

00492 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00535 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)                                 \
00536 {                                                                           \
00537     spl_t   s;                                                              \
00538                                                                             \
00539     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);                                         \
00540     code_block;                                                             \
00541     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);                                      \
00542 }

00612 #define rtdm_lock_put(lock)         rthal_spin_unlock(lock)

00631 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00632     rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)
00633 
00651 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00652     rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)
00653 
00670 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)              \
00671     rthal_local_irq_save(context)
00672 
00689 #define rtdm_lock_irqrestore(context)           \
00690     rthal_local_irq_restore(context)

00753 #define rtdm_irq_get_arg(irq_handle, type)  ((type *)irq_handle->cookie)

00756 static inline int rtdm_irq_request(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle,
00757                                    unsigned int irq_no,
00758                                    rtdm_irq_handler_t handler,
00759                                    unsigned long flags,
00760                                    const char *device_name,
00761                                    void *arg)
00762 {
00763     xnintr_init(irq_handle, device_name, irq_no, handler, NULL, flags);
00764     return xnintr_attach(irq_handle, arg);
00765 }
00766 
00767 static inline int rtdm_irq_free(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00768 {
00769     return xnintr_detach(irq_handle);
00770 }
00771 
00772 static inline int rtdm_irq_enable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00773 {
00774     return xnintr_enable(irq_handle);
00775 }
00776 
00777 static inline int rtdm_irq_disable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00778 {
00779     return xnintr_disable(irq_handle);
00780 }

00783 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00784 
00790 typedef unsigned                    rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00791 
00801 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig);
00805 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00806                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler)
00807 {
00808     *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00809 
00810     if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00811         return -EAGAIN;
00812 
00813     rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, (rthal_irq_handler_t)handler, NULL, NULL,
00814                          IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00815     return 0;
00816 }
00817 
00818 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00819 {
00820     rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00821 }
00822 
00823 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00824 {
00825     rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00826 }

00867 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
00868 {
00869     xnpod_delete_thread(task);
00870 }
00871 
00872 void rtdm_task_join_nrt(rtdm_task_t *task, unsigned int poll_delay);

00874 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
00875 {
00876     xnpod_renice_thread(task, priority);
00877     xnpod_schedule();
00878 }
00879 
00880 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task, uint64_t period)
00881 {
00882     return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00883                                      xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00884 }
00885 
00886 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
00887 {
00888     int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
00889 
00890     xnpod_schedule();
00891     return res;
00892 }
00893 
00894 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
00895 {
00896     return xnpod_current_thread();
00897 }
00898 
00899 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
00900 {
00901     XENO_ASSERT(RTDM, !xnpod_unblockable_p(), return -EPERM;);
00902     return xnpod_wait_thread_period(NULL);
00903 }

00912 typedef uint64_t                    rtdm_toseq_t;
00913 
00914 static inline void rtdm_toseq_init(rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq, int64_t timeout)
00915 {
00916     *timeout_seq = xnpod_get_time() + xnpod_ns2ticks(timeout);
00917 }

00920 /* --- event services --- */
00921 
00922 typedef struct {
00923     unsigned long                   pending;
00924     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00925 } rtdm_event_t;
00926 
00927 static inline void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending)
00928 {
00929     event->pending = pending;
00930     xnsynch_init(&event->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO);
00931 }
00932 
00933 void _rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
00934 
00935 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
00936 {
00937     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
00938 }
00939 
00940 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
00941 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, int64_t timeout,
00942                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00943 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
00944 
00945 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
00946 {
00947     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
00948 }
00949 
00950 static inline void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event)
00951 {
00952     event->pending = 0;
00953 }

00982 typedef struct {

00986 
00987 static inline void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00988 {
00989     mutex->locked = 0;
00990     xnsynch_init(&mutex->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO|XNSYNCH_PIP);
00991 }
00992 
00993 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00994 {
00995     _rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
00996 }

01024 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01025                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01026 {
01027     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, ptr, size);
01028 }
01029 
01030 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01031                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01032 {
01033     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_WRITE, ptr, size);
01034 }
01035 
01036 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01037                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01038                                       size_t size)
01039 {
01040     return __xn_copy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01041 }
01042 
01043 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01044                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01045                                     size_t size)
01046 {
01047     return __xn_copy_to_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01048 }
01049 
01050 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01051                                          char *dst,
01052                                          const char __user *src,
01053                                          size_t count)
01054 {
01055     if (unlikely(__xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, src, 1)))
01056         return -EFAULT;
01057     return __xn_strncpy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, count);
01058 }

01060 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01061 {
01062     return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01063 }
